DOC.criteria: Men woman age 1845 year Healthy , base medical screen visit Normal BMI age ( 18.525.0 kg/m2 ) Able understand sign write informed consent prior trial entry Informed consent sign Known type 1 type 2 diabetes , anamnesis Family history type 2 diabetes ( parent ) Any metabolic disease possibly impact postprandial glucose insulin response ( anamnesis , opinion medical expert ) Malabsorptive disorder include limited pancreatitis , Crohn 's disease , etc Any history neurological / psychological disease ( meningitis , epilepsy ) , opinion investigator Claustrophobia Hearing disorder Any medication impact dietary fat absorption metabolism like statin , bile acid sequestrants , lipid lower medication , fibrates , opinion medical expert Pregnancy ( anamnesis ) and/or lactation Having metallic , electronic , magnetic , mechanical implant , device , object , safety reason link magnetic field exposure ( MRS ) : Aneurysm clip ( ) Cardiac pacemaker Implanted cardioverter defibrillator ( ICD ) Electronic implant device Magneticallyactivated implant device Neurostimulation system Spinal cord stimulator Cochlear implant implant hearing aid Insulin infusion pump Implanted drug infusion device Any type prosthesis implant Artificial prosthetic limb Any metallic fragment foreign body Hearing aid Other implant Subject injure metallic object foreign body History cancer within past year Allergy intolerance food compound use Currently follow strict exercise program ( minimum three time per week ) order either lose weight , gain muscle reach competition standard choose sport Currently participate participate clinical trial past month Subjects willing and/or able comply schedule visit requirement research protocol . Subject hierarchical link investigator coinvestigators . Subject expect comply research protocol .
